facebook.summary:
Our great colleague Stefano Manzoni has just published a book on "Networks", including some of the ideas that he's exploring in our Amazon Andes project - please check it out!
http://iopscience.iop.org/book/978-1-6817-4159-8

facebook.title: Networks on Networks, Morgan & Claypool Publishers
facebook.summary: Check out the new book Networks on Networks: The Physics of Geobiology and Geochemistry by Allen Hunt and Stefano Manzoni. Allen was an IPA in Hydrology, and is now in the Physics Department at Wright State University.
